tasks.label: FASTLIO2 Mapping Stack
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch robofi_bringup fastlio2_navigation.launch.py launch_nav2:=false launch_localizer:=false launch_octomap:=true

tasks.label: FASTLIO2 Navigation Stack
args: source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch robofi_bringup fastlio2_navigation.launch.py launch_nav2:=true launch_localizer:=true nav2_use_amcl:=false
